description: This file provides the export API prototypes for the Server List Management Object (SLMO) component. It includes function declarations for creating, removing, enrolling, and initializing the SLMO object, and contains license information and module documentation.

methods.name: CfSlmoComponentCreate
methods.description: Creates a SLMO component with specified container, owner, and reserved contexts.

methods.name: CfSlmoCreate
methods.description: Creates a new SLMO instance with specified contexts.

methods.name: CfSlmoEnrollObjects
methods.description: Enrolls objects within the specified SLMO instance.
